amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being used for the Bakersfield Beltway System, California.

action.text: Mr. Boozman raised a point of order against the Flake amendment (A031). Mr. Boozman stated that the amendment violates clause 3 of Rule XXI. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Flake.
